p.dialogue: "Oh... you're that new farmer boy, aren't you?^Oh... You're that new farmer girl, or whatever. Aren't you?#$e#Huh? Oh... I'm Haley.#$e#Hmm... If it weren't for those horrendous clothes you might actually be cute.^Hmm... If it weren't for those horrendous clothes you might actually be pretty... Actually, nevermind.$h"
"I saw a dolphin on the way in!"
"There's something about the sun that just makes me feel good."
"It's strange the places life can take you... who knows what other lands are out there?"
"Wow, look at how the sunlight sparkles on the horizon!$h#$b#I bet the sunsets here would make for an amazing photo.#$e#I have to remember to bring my camera next time."
"Getting the perfect tan is an artform...#$e#It's kind of like toasting a marshmallow... you have to rotate the body just right.$h"
"Laying out on a tropical beach.#$b#*sigh* I think I've finally found my place in the universe.#$e#But I guess Stardew Valley's not such a bad place either!$h"
"Emily's friend had this swimsuit shipped to me from all the way out in Zuzu City.#$e#City fashion is on a whole different level, isn't it?$h"
"I painted my toenails blue to match the sea. What do you think? *wiggle* *wiggle*$h"
"Gus made a cute, fruity drink just for me!$h"
"This is such a perfect beach. I'd stay here forever if I could!"
"Ew... No."
"I'll be fine on my own...$7#$e#Thanks for the memories.$7#$e#Why are you still clinging to me? Go live your own life.$7"
"Agh!$8#$b#Oh... hmph. Beat me to it, huh? Alright..."
"I've got nothing to say to you!$a"
"Alright, alright... I'm done giving you the cold shoulder. Just promise me you'll never, ever lie to me again.$s"
"This town is so small. It sucks.$u#$e#I have to drive, like, twenty miles to buy any decent clothes.$s#$e#That's why I usually just order online.#$e#What?"
"Nice shoes.^Nice makeup.#$b#Are those made out of plastic?^Or wait... Are you even wearing any?#$e#I'm bored."
"The only thing I like about this town is the beach.$u"

"#$1 HaleyClothes#I've decided I am going to organize my clothes today. I'll have to throw out all of last year's styles to make room for the new ones!#$e#*sigh* I could really go for a cupcake right now.#$e#Do you need something?"
"%Haley is ignoring you."
"Don't you get tired of running around on that farm all day, or whatever it is you do?#$e#I couldn't stand getting all dirty like that.#$e#You probably get a nice tan, though."
"I'm feeling an urge to go shopping. Ugh! I wish there was a mall here."
"My sister is so weird. Sometimes I wonder if we're actually related.$u"
"There are only two things I like about this town.#$b#One of them is the beach.#$e#The other one is a secret! *giggle*$h"
"I wonder if any nice shells washed up on the beach this morning?#$e#This isn't the best time of year for shells, though."
"I'm glad that the flowers are starting to bloom.#$e#Those pink ones smell so good.$h"
"I need to find some kind of hobby other than shopping.#$e#I've decided I want to expand my horizons.#$e#Maybe I should learn to play the mini-harp?"
"I used to complain about this town being so small, but I've grown to like it.#$e#If it was much bigger it wouldn't feel like a community."
"I cooked dinner last night. It actually turned out okay!#$e#But I did make a huge mess in the kitchen..."
"I'm thinking about donating a bunch of clothes... I must have a hundred pairs of shoes."

"#$1 haleySeagull#Yesterday I found a seagull with her wing caught in a net. I set her free, of course. She looked so helpless, the poor thing.$k$s#$e#You know, I should probably start exercising more... this youthful metabolism won't last forever."
"@, can we go on a camping trip someday?#$e#The most exotic place I've been is Zuzu city."
"NO!! I'm not going to do it!$a#$b#You guys are both stupid!%fork$a"
"She should take the 'high road'? What's that supposed to mean?$u#$b#You think I'm being a baby, huh?%fork$a"
"Great, then you shouldn't have any problem opening this jar for me!$h"
"Oh... you aren't? Hmmm...$s#$b#Well could you try opening this jar for me anyways?"
"Aw, thanks!$h"
"Oh! I thought you knew.#$b#This room's for developing photos."
"Is that so...?$s"
"Aw, thanks!$h"
"Oh! I thought you knew.#$b#This room's for developing photos."
"Is that so...?$s"
"No, you won't! This bracelet was passed down to me by my great-grandmother!$a"
"*sigh*$s#$b#...Maybe it'll wash up on another shore. I can't bear to think of it at the bottom of the ocean.$s"
"Him? No!#$b#...Well, I guess I used to like Alex. But not anymore! He's immature."
"What? That sounds fun, but I wouldn't want to leave Stardew Valley right now..."
"Huh? What's an android?"
"I'm going to get such a nice tan this summer."
"Ew, you're all dirty."
"Um... Yes?#$e#I didn't hear you, I'm thinking about something else."
"Do you have baby bunnies on your farm? Bunnies are SO cute! <"
"If you stay in the sun a lot it'll make your hair lighter.#$e#It's a good thing to know!"
"I wonder what Alex is doing today...#$e#Huh? I didn't notice you standing there."

"Farming sounds so boring...#$q 42/43 summer_Sat_old#What do you even do all day?#$r 42 10 summer_Sat_12#Care for plants#$r 42 10 summer_Sat_12#Explore the caves#$r 43 -10 summer_Sat_13#Snoop around in your room#$r 42 10 summer_Sat_12#Dig for treasure"
"#$p 43#Hey, you better not be snooping around in my room anymore!$a|But I guess it could get you in pretty good shape."
"Hmm... sounds like a lot of work."
"What? You'd better not be doing that!$a"
"Emily usually cooks dinner... But she makes weird stuff like quinoa."
"Do you wear those clothes every day?"
"$p 47#Hey I found this new tool to open jars with. So you won't need to help me anymore.$h|There's not a cloud in the sky today.$h"
"It's so hot today!#$e#I wish I had some ice cream.$s"
"I spent 3 hours practicing my signature today.#$e#I guess that's pretty silly, huh?"
"If you stay in the sun a lot it will make your hair lighter... But you don't want to get sunburnt, either.#$e#I just want a healthy amount of sunlight. Everything in moderation, right?"
"I should start reading some books instead of magazines.#$e#It's good to learn things, isn't it?#$e#I only ever look at the pictures."

"#$1 HaleySister#I talked to my sister for a while last night. I actually enjoyed it quite a bit.#$e#You know, Emily's not actually that weird. I guess we have more in common than I used to think.#$e#Don't tell her I said so."
"It seems like a good day to go swimming."
"I guess living in the country isn't so bad.#$e#If I lived in the city I might start to miss all the trees.#$e#@, I think I've been hanging out with you too much.$h"
"Oh, hi @!#$e#Do you like kids?$l"
"It's fall already?$s"
"It's gross when all these fallen leaves get slimy."
"Hmm... Something smells weird...#$e#You've been working on the farm, huh?"
"Oh, hi. Did you want something?"
"I feel the urge to go shopping. *sigh*"
"Is that a grass stain on your knee?#$e#Sorry, I'm allergic to grass."

"It's too cold to go to the beach anymore.#$q 44 fall_Sat_old#*sigh*...what do you think I should do today?#$r 44 10 fall_Sat_12#Watercolor painting#$r 44 20 fall_Sat_12#Relax and read a magazine#$r 44 -30 fall_Sat_13#Stop being a selfish crybaby"
"I'll probably take a nap later."
"Hmm... That's a pretty good idea, actually."
"Get away from me, you stupid jerk.$a"
"I've never been to the forest. It's muddy and I could get a blister on my foot."
"Something smells earthy...#$b#Oh, right. You work on a farm."
"You look like you've been doing a lot of hard work.#$b#Why don't you take the rest of the day off?"
"If you're ever bored, come say hi."
"Shopping just doesn't sound as fun as it used to.#$e#What's happening to me?#$e#Hmm..."
"$p 48#Did I ever tell you I found another one of my great-grandma's bracelets in the attic?|See this bracelet? It belonged to my great-grandmother.#$e#She was a really interesting lady."
"I've never been to the forest, you know.#$e#It might be interesting to explore it some day."
"I'm starting to like the smell of dirt. Isn't that weird?#$e#I think it's because you're around all the time.$h"
"@, I'm happy to see you today.$h"
"I want to move somewhere warmer."
"Hi. Do you need something from me?#$e#..."
"Hmm. What brand is your shirt?#$e#Oh. Um, nevermind."
"I wish someone would bring me a peppermint coffee.$s#$e#Don't even bother, I know you won't be able to make one."
"I'm going to start writing a list of all the clothes I need for next spring."
"Do you have a pony on your farm?$h#$e#Oh. That's disappointing...$s"
"The only good thing about winter is that I get to sleep more.#$e#I like at least 10 hours of sleep every night."
"Will you say hi to Alex for me?#$e#Thanks."
"Your name is @, right?#$e#I keep forgetting."
"Hi @.#$e#Is anything exciting happening on your farm?"
"I think I'm starting to realize that clothes aren't the most important thing. Right?#$e#I still like clothes, though. I mean, what's wrong with expressing yourself a little?"
"Maybe I'll donate some of my skirts to a charity this spring.#$e#I mean, I do have over 1,000 skirts.$h#$e#...what?"
"Um, if you see Alex could you tell him I'm busy today?#$e#Thanks."
"I wish it were warmer here in Stardew Valley.#$e#I could move somewhere else, but..."
"Do you think you'll ever have a pony on your farm?"
"I'm glad you have less work to do in the winter.#$e#It must be nice to have a break, huh?"
"@, you look rugged today. I like it.^@, you look pretty today.#$e#...$h"
